mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evnt (evnt_title, evnt_strt, evnt_end, evnt_pic_name, evnt_pic_path, evnt_thum_name, evnt_thum_path, evnt_ctnts) VALUES ( #{evnt_title}, DATE(#{evnt_strt}), DATE(#{evnt_end}), #{evnt_pic_name}, #{evnt_pic_path} , #{evnt_thum_name},#{evnt_thum_path}, #{evnt_ctnts} )
mapper.select: SELECT evnt_no,evnt_title, evnt_strt, evnt_end, evnt_pic_name, evnt_pic_path, evnt_thum_name, evnt_thum_path, evnt_ctnts FROM evnt where now() between evnt_strt and evnt_end;
